CustomField.description: Prevents creation of the first installment Opportunity for a new Recurring Donation, regardless of the Installment Opportunity Auto-Creation setting in NPSP Settings.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Prevents creation of the first installment Opportunity for a new Recurring Donation, regardless of the Installment Opportunity Auto-Creation setting in NPSP Settings.
CustomField.label: Disable First Installment
